starting_equipment: Martial Weapon and a Shield OR Two Martial Weapons
Light Crossbow and 20 bolts OR Two Handaxes

level_1_features.name: Fighting Style
level_1_features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options: Archery, Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, Protection, or Two-Weapon Fighting.

level_1_features.name: Second Wind
level_1_features.description: You can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once per short or long rest.
